author: donaldp
msg: Add a first cut of an abstractFacade task. This is supposed to be the base class of the Jspc, Javac, Rmic and similar facade tasks

author: donaldp
msg: Expose the new Configuration methods in AbstractContainer task

author: adammurdoch
msg: * Moved parsing of "project->target" dependencies out of DefaultWorkspace,
* DefaultWorkspace now detects cycles in the target dependency graph.
* DefaultWorkspace now executes the implicit target for referenced projects.
* Added a few more test cases for DefaultProjectBuilder.
* Removed AbstractComponentTest.setup().  Components are now created on demand.
